annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m partnering again with Luxardo and Anchor Distilling to bring you the Hemingway Daiquiri! This version is a classic alter...
annotations.title: Hemingway Daiquiri | How to Drink

textContent:
.25oz Maraschino
.25oz Grapefruit juice
.75oz Lime juice
2oz White Rhum Agricole or Rum of choice

Shake over cracked ice and pour
Garnish with lime wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cY5uZh3176M
title: Hemingway Daiquiri
